sqlquery.name: configquery.BaseCategoryClass.SelectAll
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( select c1 as BaseCategoryClassid, C650000001 as BaseCategoryClassName, C650000002 as BaseCategoryClassCode, C650000003 as BaseCategoryClassDesc from {WF:Config_BaseCategoryClass} base ) $orderby$

sqlquery.name: configquery.BaseCatgory.SelectAll
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( SELECT C1 as BaseCategoryID, C650000008 as BaseCategoryBtnAllIDS, C650000015 as BaseCategoryBtnFixIDS, C650000014 as BaseCategoryBtnFreeIDS, C650000010 as BaseCategoryClassCode, C650000009 as BaseCategoryClassName, C650000003 as BaseCategoryCode, C650000006 as BaseCategoryDayLastNo, C650000012 as BaseCategoryDefaultFixTplBase, C650000007 as BaseCategoryDesc, C650000011 as BaseCategoryIsDefaultFix, C650000004 as BaseCategoryIsFlow, C650000001 as BaseCategoryName, C650000016 as BaseCategoryPageHIDS, C650000013 as BaseCategoryPageIDS, C650000002 as BaseCategorySchama, C650000005 as BaseCategoryState FROM {WF:Config_BaseCategory} base where 1=1 $checkflow$ ) $orderby$

sqlquery.name: configquery.BaseCatgory.BaseOn_BaseSchamaSelectOne
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( SELECT C1 as BaseCategoryID, C650000008 as BaseCategoryBtnAllIDS, C650000015 as BaseCategoryBtnFixIDS, C650000014 as BaseCategoryBtnFreeIDS, C650000010 as BaseCategoryClassCode, C650000009 as BaseCategoryClassName, C650000003 as BaseCategoryCode, C650000006 as BaseCategoryDayLastNo, C650000012 as BaseCategoryDefaultFixTplBase, C650000007 as BaseCategoryDesc, C650000011 as BaseCategoryIsDefaultFix, C650000004 as BaseCategoryIsFlow, C650000001 as BaseCategoryName, C650000016 as BaseCategoryPageHIDS, C650000013 as BaseCategoryPageIDS, C650000002 as BaseCategorySchama, C650000005 as BaseCategoryState FROM {WF:Config_BaseCategory} base where $BaseOn_SchamaSelectOne$ )
